p: COVID-19 Reporting Module is an extension of the existing Reporting Module [ 40]. The module is realized in order to facilitate the creation of fast and efficient reports during the pandemic. The possibilities of creating jobs and periodic reporting are supported by sending automated reports via email to the heads of services and management of health center about the current situation related to the COVID-19 pandemic. This module enables the creation of dynamic reports and has a personalization option for each employee.
